mc.name: Goblin Cadets
mc.oracleText: Whenever Goblin Cadets blocks or becomes blocked, target opponent gains control of it. (This removes Goblin Cadets from combat.)
mc.printedText: Whenever Goblin Cadets blocks or becomes blocked, target opponent gains control of it. (This removes Goblin Cadets from combat.)
mc.flavorText: "If you kids don't stop that racket, I'm turning this expedition around right now"

mc.name: Falter
mc.oracleText: Creatures without flying can't block this turn.
mc.printedText: Creatures without flying cannot block this turn.
mc.flavorText: Like a sleeping dragon, Shiv stirs and groans at times.

mc.name: Goblin Spelunkers
mc.oracleText: Mountainwalk
mc.printedText: Mountainwalk (If defending player controls a mountain, this creature is unblockable.)
mc.flavorText:
"It only short jump. You go first."
"AIIIEEEE"
"Hmm . . . we go different way now."

mc.name: Raze
mc.oracleText:
As an additional cost to play Raze, sacrifice a land.

Destroy target land.
mc.printedText:
At the time you play Raze, sacrifice a land.
Destroy target land.
mc.flavorText: The viashino believe that the oldest mountains hate everyone equally.

mc.name: Shower of Sparks
mc.oracleText: Shower of Sparks deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to target player.
mc.printedText: Shower of Sparks deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to target player.
mc.flavorText: The viashino had learned how to operate the rig through trial and error--mostly error.

mc.name: Crater Hellion
mc.oracleText:
Echo {4}{R}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Crater Hellion comes into play, it deals 4 damage to each other creature.
mc.printedText:
Echo (During your next upkeep after this permanent comes under your control, pay its casting cost or sacrifice it.)
When Crater Hellion comes into play, it deals 4 damage to each other creature.

mc.name: Voltaic Key
mc.oracleText: {1}, {T}: Untap target artifact.
mc.printedText: {1}, {T}: Untap target artifact.
mc.flavorText: The key did not work on a single lock, yet it opened many doors.

mc.name: Temporal Aperture
mc.oracleText: {5}, {T}: Shuffle your library and reveal the top card. Until end of turn, as long as that card remains on top of your library, you may play the card without paying its mana cost. (If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.)
mc.printedText: {5}, {T}: Shuffle your library and reveal the top card. Until end of turn, as long as that card remains on top of your library, you may play the card as though it were in your hand without paying its casting cost. (If the spell has {X} in its casting cost, X is 0.)

mc.name: Mobile Fort
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{3}: Mobile Fort gets +3/-1 until end of turn and can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender. Play this ability only once each turn.
mc.printedText:
Mobile Fort counts as a Wall. (Walls cannot attack.)
{3}: Mobile Fort gets +3/-1 until end of turn and can attack this turn as though it were not a Wall. Play this ability only once each turn.

mc.name: Abundance
mc.oracleText: If you would draw a card, you may instead choose land or nonland and reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.
mc.printedText: Instead of drawing a card, you may choose land or nonland and reveal cards from your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and put all other revealed cards on the bottom of your library in any order.

mc.name: Citanul Centaurs
mc.oracleText:
Shroud (This permanent can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Echo {3}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
mc.printedText:
Echo (During your next upkeep after this permanent comes under your control, pay its casting cost or sacrifice it.)
Citanul Centaurs cannot be the target of spells or abilities.

mc.name: Sicken
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1.
Cycling {2} (You may pay {2} and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)
mc.flavorText: Urza dared to attack Phyrexia. Slowly, it retaliated.

mc.name: Unnerve
mc.oracleText: Each opponent discards two cards.
mc.printedText: Each of your opponents chooses and discards two cards.
mc.flavorText:
"If fear is the only tool you have left, then you'll never control me."
--Xantcha, to Gix

mc.name: Crazed Skirge
mc.oracleText: Flying, haste
mc.printedText:
Flying
Crazed Skirge is unaffected by summoning sickness.
mc.flavorText: They are Phyrexia's couriers; the messages they carry are inscribed on their slick hides.

mc.name: Exhume
mc.oracleText: Each player puts a creature card from his or her graveyard into play.
mc.printedText: Each player chooses a creature card in his or her graveyard and puts that creature into play.
mc.flavorText:
"Death--an outmoded concept. We sleep, and we change."
--Sitrik, birth priest

mc.name: Duress
mc.oracleText: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. Choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
mc.printedText: Look at target opponent's hand and choose a noncreature, nonland card there. That player discards that card.
mc.flavorText:
"We decide who is worthy of our works."
--Gix, Yawgmoth praetor

mc.name: Reprocess
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice any number of artifacts, creatures, and/or lands. Draw a card for each permanent sacrificed this way.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice any number of artifacts, creatures, and/or lands and draw a card for each one sacrificed this way.
mc.flavorText: Everything will find its use in Phyrexia. Eventually.

mc.name: Shivan Raptor
mc.oracleText:
First strike, haste
Echo {2}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
mc.printedText:
First strike; echo (During your next upkeep after this permanent comes under your control, pay its casting cost or sacrifice it.)
Shivan Raptor is unaffected by summoning sickness.

mc.name: Steam Blast
mc.oracleText: Steam Blast deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.
mc.printedText: Steam Blast deals 2 damage to each creature and player.
mc.flavorText: The viashino knew of the cracked pipes but deliberately left them unmended to bolster the rig's defenses.

mc.name: Brand
mc.oracleText:
Gain control of all permanents you own. (This effect doesn't end at end of turn.)
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Gain control of all permanents you own.
Cycling {2} (You may pay {2} and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)
mc.flavorText:
"By this glyph I affirm your role."
--Urza, to Karn

mc.name: Viashino Sandswimmer
mc.oracleText: {R}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, return Viashino Sandswimmer to its owner's hand. If you lose the flip, sacrifice Viashino Sandswimmer.
mc.printedText: {R}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, return Viashino Sandswimmer to owner's hand. Otherwise, sacrifice Viashino Sandswimmer.
mc.flavorText: Few swim in a place of such thirst.

mc.name: Wildfire
mc.oracleText: Each player sacrifices four lands. Wildfire deals 4 damage to each creature.
mc.printedText: Each player sacrifices four lands, then Wildfire deals 4 damage to each creature.
mc.flavorText:
"Shiv hatched from a shell of stone around a yolk of flame."
--Viashino myth

mc.name: Cackling Fiend
mc.oracleText: When Cackling Fiend comes into play, each opponent discards a card.
mc.printedText: When Cackling Fiend comes into play, each of your opponents chooses and discards a card.
mc.flavorText: Its windpipe is only the first to amplify its maddening laughter.

mc.name: Fire Ants
mc.oracleText: {T}: Fire Ants deals 1 damage to each other creature without flying.
mc.printedText: {T}: Fire Ants deals 1 damage to each other creature without flying.
mc.flavorText: Visitors to Shiv fear the dragons, the goblins, or the viashino. Natives fear the ants.

mc.name: Scoria Wurm
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, return Scoria Wurm to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText: During your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, return Scoria Wurm to owner's hand.
mc.flavorText: Late at night, ululations echo from deep under Shiv, as the wurms sing of times older than humanity.

mc.name: Ill-Gotten Gains
mc.oracleText:
Each player discards his or her hand, then returns up to three cards from his or her graveyard to his or her hand.
Remove Ill-Gotten Gains from the game.
mc.printedText: Remove Ill-Gotten Gains from the game. All players discard their hands, then each player puts up to three cards from his or her graveyard into his or her hand.
mc.flavorText: Urza thought it a crusade. Xantcha knew it was a robbery.

mc.name: Antagonism
mc.oracleText: At the end of each player's turn, Antagonism deals 2 damage to that player unless one of his or her opponents was dealt damage that turn.
mc.printedText: During each player's discard phase, Antagonism deals 2 damage to that player unless one of his or her opponents was successfully dealt damage that turn.

mc.name: Skittering Skirge
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When you play a creature spell, sacrifice Skittering Skirge.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When you successfully cast a creature spell, sacrifice Skittering Skirge.
mc.flavorText: The imps' warbling cries echo through Phyrexia's towers like those of mourning doves in a cathedral.

mc.name: Urza's Armor
mc.oracleText: If a source would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.
mc.printedText: Whenever a source deals damage to you, that damage is reduced by 1.
mc.flavorText:
"Tawnos's blueprints were critical to the creation of my armor. As he once sealed himself in steel, I sealed myself in a walking crypt."
--Urza

mc.name: Pendrell Drake
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Flying
Cycling {2} (You may pay {2} and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)
mc.flavorText: The mages of Tolaria found strange ways to spend their free time. Occasionally they had contests to see whose kite was eaten last.

mc.name: Worship
mc.oracleText: If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.
mc.printedText: Damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 instead reduces it to 1 if you control a creature.
mc.flavorText:
"Believe in the ideal, not the idol."
--Serra

mc.name: Bull Hippo
mc.oracleText: Islandwalk
mc.printedText: Islandwalk (If defending player controls an island, this creature is unblockable.)
mc.flavorText:
"How could you not hear it approach? It's a hippo"
--Argivian commander

mc.oracleText:
Flying, vigilance
Echo {2}{W}{W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
mc.printedText:
Flying; echo (During your next upkeep after this permanent comes under your control, pay its casting cost or sacrifice it.)

Okk can't attack unless a creature with greater power also attacks.
Okk can't block unless a creature with greater power also blocks.
mc.printedText:
Okk cannot attack unless a creature with greater power also attacks.
Okk cannot block unless a creature with greater power also blocks.

mc.oracleText: Instead of the attacking player, you assign the combat damage of creatures attacking you.
mc.printedText: Instead of the attacking player, you choose how creatures attacking you deal combat damage.
mc.flavorText:
"Your enemies will pound upon the door of your defenses, but only you shall have the key, and it is the key of life."
--Song of All, canto 873

mc.printedText: Whenever a creature blocks it, Viashino Weaponsmith gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

mc.name: Looming Shade
mc.oracleText: {B}: Looming Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {B}: Looming Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

mc.name: Sneak Attack
mc.oracleText: {R}: You may put a creature card from your hand into play. That creature gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice the creature at end of turn.
mc.printedText: {R}: Choose a creature card from your hand and put that creature into play. The creature is unaffected by summoning sickness. At end of turn, sacrifice the creature.
mc.flavorText: "Nothin' beat surprise--'cept rock."

mc.name: Attunement
mc.oracleText: Return Attunement to its owner's hand: Draw three cards, then discard four cards.
mc.printedText: Return Attunement to owner's hand: Draw three cards, then choose and discard four cards.
mc.flavorText:
"The solution can hide for only so long."
--Urza

mc.name: Bog Raiders
mc.oracleText: Swampwalk
mc.printedText: Swampwalk (If defending player controls a swamp, this creature is unblockable.)
mc.flavorText:
"Let weak feed on weak, that we may divine the nature of strength."
--Phyrexian Scriptures

mc.name: Sunder
mc.oracleText: Return all lands to their owners' hands.
mc.printedText: Return all lands to owners' hands.
mc.flavorText: The flow of time was disrupted; like a flooding river it rose from its banks. Tolaria was drowned in an instant that stretched toward infinity.

mc.name: Serra's Hymn
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Serra's Hymn.

Sacrifice Serra's Hymn: Prevent up to X damage total that would be dealt this turn to any number of target creatures and/or players, divided as you choose, where X is the number of verse counters on Serra's Hymn.
mc.printedText:
During your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Serra's Hymn.
Sacrifice Serra's Hymn: Prevent up to X damage total to any number of creatures and/or players, where X is the number of verse counters on Serra's Hymn.

mc.name: Anaconda

mc.printedText: Swampwalk (If defending player controls a swamp, this creature is unblockable.)
mc.flavorText: If you're smaller than the anaconda, it considers you food. If you're larger than the anaconda, it considers you a lot of food.

mc.name: Fecundity
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature is put into a graveyard from play, that creature's controller may draw a card.
mc.printedText: Whenever a creature is put into a graveyard from play, that creature's controller may draw a card.
mc.flavorText: Life is eternal. A lifetime is ephemeral.

mc.name: Befoul
mc.oracleText: Destroy target land or nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: Destroy target land or nonblack creature. A creature destroyed this way cannot be regenerated this turn.

"The land putrefied at its touch, turned into an oily bile in seconds."
--Radiant, archangel

mc.name: Hollow Dogs
mc.oracleText: Whenever Hollow Dogs attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever Hollow Dogs attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: A hollow dog is never empty. It is filled with thirst for the hunt.

mc.oracleText: Whenever a card is put into a graveyard, remove that card from the game.
mc.printedText: Whenever a card is put into a graveyard, remove that card from the game.

"Planeswalking isn't about walking. It's about falling and screaming."

mc.name: Blasted Landscape
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

mc.printedText:
{T}: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool.
Cycling {2} (You may pay {2} and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)

mc.name: Coral Merfolk
mc.flavorText: It is not unusual for a single family of coral merfolk to spend centuries carefully guiding the growth of the reefs where they make their home.

mc.name: Pendrell Flux
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature unless you pay its mana cost."
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gains "During your upkeep, pay this creature's casting cost or sacrifice it."
mc.flavorText: Devoured by the mists, Tolaria was stuck in time, trapped between two eternal heartbeats.

mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Lilting Refrain.

mc.printedText: Whenever a green creature is put into a graveyard from play, its controller chooses and discards a card.

mc.printedText: {2}{B}, {T}: Remove from the game up to three target cards in one graveyard.

mc.name: Darkest Hour
mc.oracleText: All creatures are black.
mc.printedText: All creatures are black.
mc.flavorText:
"Yawgmoth spent eons wrapping Phyrexians in human skin. They are the sleeper agents, and they are everywhere."
--Xantcha, to Urza

mc.name: Blanchwood Armor
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you play this. This card comes into play attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Forest you control.
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gets +X/+X, where X is the number of forests you control.
mc.flavorText:
"Braid her branches, life fulfilling
Goddess loving, Goddess killing."
--Citanul chant

mc.name: Order of Yawgmoth
mc.oracleText:
Fear
Whenever Order of Yawgmoth deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.
mc.printedText:
Order of Yawgmoth cannot be blocked except by artifact creatures and black creatures.
Whenever Order of Yawgmoth successfully deals damage to a player, that player chooses and discards a card.

mc.name: Dark Ritual
mc.oracleText: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText:
"From void evolved Phyrexia. Great Yawgmoth, Father of Machines, saw its perfection. Thus The Grand Evolution began."
--Phyrexian Scriptures

mc.name: Sanguine Guard
mc.oracleText:
First strike
{1}{B}: Regenerate Sanguine Guard.
mc.printedText:
First strike
{1}{B}: Regenerate Sanguine Guard.
mc.flavorText:
"Father of Machines Your filigree gaze carves us, and the scars dance upon our grateful flesh."
--Phyrexian Scriptures

mc.name: Yawgmoth's Will
mc.oracleText:
Until end of turn, you may play cards in your graveyard.
If a card would be put into your graveyard this turn, remove that card from the game instead.
mc.printedText: Until end of turn, you may play cards in your graveyard as though they were in your hand. Cards put into your graveyard this turn are removed from the game instead.

mc.name: Disenchant
mc.oracleText: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
mc.printedText: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
mc.flavorText:
"Let Phyrexia breed evil in the darkness; my holy light will reveal its taint."
--Serra

mc.printedText: Two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Although the elves of Argoth always considered them a nuisance, the pixies made fine allies during the war against the machines.

mc.name: Breach
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains fear until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. That creature cannot be blocked except by artifact creatures and black creatures this turn.

mc.name: Disciple of Grace
mc.oracleText:
Protection from black
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Protection from black
Cycling {2} (You may pay {2} and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)
mc.flavorText: Beauty is beyond law.

mc.name: Voice of Grace
mc.oracleText: Flying, protection from black
mc.printedText: Flying, protection from black
mc.flavorText:
"Opposite Law is Grace, and Grace must be preserved. If the strands of Grace are unraveled, its design will be lost, and the people with it."
--Song of All, canto 167

mc.name: Abyssal Horror
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Abyssal Horror comes into play, target player discards two cards.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Abyssal Horror comes into play, target player chooses and discards two cards.
mc.flavorText: It has no face of its own--it wears that of its latest victim.

mc.name: Catastrophe
mc.oracleText: Destroy all lands or all creatures. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: Destroy all lands or all creatures. Creatures destroyed this way cannot regenerate this turn.
mc.flavorText: Radiant's eyes flashed. "Go, then," the angel spat at Serra, "and leave this world to those who truly care."

mc.name: Sulfuric Vapors
mc.oracleText: If a red spell would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals that much damage plus 1 to that creature or player instead.
mc.printedText: Whenever a red spell deals damage, it instead deals that amount of damage plus 1.
mc.flavorText: It was the dragons who first learned to chase their prey into the vapors before igniting them.

mc.name: Exhaustion
mc.oracleText: Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during his or her next untap step.
mc.printedText: Creatures and lands target opponent controls do not untap during his or her next untap phase.
mc.flavorText: The mage felt as though he'd been in the stasis suit for days. Upon his return, he found it was months.

mc.name: Silent Attendant
mc.oracleText: {T}: You gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: {T}: Gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText: "The answer to life should never be death; it should always be more life, wrapped tight around us like precious silks."

mc.name: Phyrexian Ghoul
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a creature: Phyrexian Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a creature: Phyrexian Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Phyrexia wastes nothing. Its food chain is a spiraling cycle.

mc.name: Goblin Patrol
mc.oracleText: Echo {R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
mc.printedText: Echo (During your next upkeep after this permanent comes under your control, pay its casting cost or sacrifice it.)
mc.flavorText:
"Take the sharp metal stick and make a lotta holes."

mc.printedText: Whenever Flesh Reaver successfully deals damage to a creature or opponent, Flesh Reaver deals an equal amount of damage to you.

mc.name: Fertile Ground

mc.printedText: Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, it produces an additional one mana of any color.

mc.printedText: Viashino Runner cannot be blocked by only one creature.

--Jula, goblin raider

mc.printedText: Jagged Lightning deals 3 damage to target creature and 3 damage to another target creature.
mc.flavorText: The pungent smell of roasting flesh made both mages realize they'd rather break for dinner than fight.

Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

Flying
{1}{R}: Shivan Hellkite deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: A dragon's scale can be carved into a mighty shield, provided you can procure a dragontooth to cut it.

mc.printedText: When Stern Proctor comes into play, return target artifact or enchantment to owner's hand.
mc.flavorText:
"I preferred the harsh tutors--they made mischief all the more fun."
--Teferi, third-level student

Enchant enchantment

mc.printedText: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then discard a card at random. Shuffle your library afterward.
mc.flavorText: When you've got nothing, you might as well trade it for something else.
